name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized user exploited a remote script interpreter to execute commands and gain access to sensitive data.

action--e4bdec9c-f9a4-4be9-8f3f-6f0178cf.name: Terminate unauthorized process
action--e4bdec9c-f9a4-4be9-8f3f-6f0178cf.description: Terminate any unauthorized processes that may still be running.

action--0bebdbe3-e5b0-4a96-a0d5-060bde06.name: Quarantine affected host
action--0bebdbe3-e5b0-4a96-a0d5-060bde06.description: Block any incoming traffic from the affected host.

action--b8f3b07b-718b-42fb-bc14-8f924b35.name: Scan host for rootkits
action--b8f3b07b-718b-42fb-bc14-8f924b35.description: Scan the host for rootkits until the system is clean.

system_status.description: The current status of the system after the scan

action--de9e7b7a-155d-43f5-8e2c-aaecf8d1.name: Update system access controls
action--de9e7b7a-155d-43f5-8e2c-aaecf8d1.description: Update access controls on sensitive data to prevent unauthorized access.
action--de9e7b7a-155d-43f5-8e2c-aaecf8d1.condition: if attack_logs contains Data Access Attempt

parallel--daf64e87-bb37-4e7d-aa69-83ac5a.name: Apply firewall rules and additional mitigations
parallel--daf64e87-bb37-4e7d-aa69-83ac5a.description: Parallel execution of firewall rules update and additional security measures.

action--7791f531-5ec3-4dbb-98f5-dfc46bc9.name: Review and apply strict firewall rules
action--7791f531-5ec3-4dbb-98f5-dfc46bc9.description: Implement strict firewall rules to tighten security.
